text: Hey community! I need your help! Check this thread.

For those who don’t know me, I lost my mother-in-law last year, in 2022.

To a horrific disease named ALS.

Back in 2020, right at the height of COVID, my mother-in-law got diagnosed with ALS.

My wife, Michelle, my partner in crime, my coworker, the love of my life, and I decided to move her mom (and dad) into the house with us!

Yes, with two kids under 6, a dog, and a business all under a single house!

But I need your help! I’m doing the ALS Soakee challenge!

Our goal is $2,500, and we can get there fast if we all donate $5.

Here’s a <https://www.linkedin.com/posts/justindgivens_als-community-love-activity-7078008393155633152-1eNg|video explaining more>.

Here’s the <https://donate.al.als.org/fundraiser/4751198|link to the donation page>.
